detectors.description:
yff.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#88-93) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#90)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
yff.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#95-101) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#98)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#13)
	- yff.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#70-72)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#14)
	- yff.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#74-76)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#15)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#16)
	- yff.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#88-93)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#17)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- yff.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#95-101)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/yff.sol#33)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
